snippet.title: Guardian Sphere - Trailer
snippet.description:
itchio : https://pixel-boy.itch.io/guardian-sphere
gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/GuardianSphere/411785

Guardian Sphere is a shoot 'em up in which you use your life point to buy full of upgrades and make your Guardian strong enough to deal with waves of invaders, playable in cooperation up to 2 players.
